title: Green Water Lullaby
description: Short stories from Lori Chyrsalis, South Carolina, looks like an ordinary town.But things are not what they appear on the surface.Here, lovers can return from the dead. Vicious "animal" attacks seem to be getting closer to populated areas. Friends offer up other friends for sacrifice. And a young family struggles for survival when a hurricane comes through. Want to know more? Welcome to Chrysalis.Read Green Water Lullaby.
author: Lori Titus
